mapper.select: SELECT '이슈' AS NAME , A.ISSUE_STATUS AS STATE , COUNT(ISSUE_STATUS) AS COUNT FROM ISSUE A GROUP BY A.ISSUE_STATUS
SELECT '백로그' AS NAME , A.BACKLOG_STATUS AS STATE , COUNT(BACKLOG_STATUS) AS COUNT FROM BACKLOG A GROUP BY A.BACKLOG_STATUS
SELECT '스프린트' AS NAME , A.SPRINT_STATE AS STATE , COUNT(SPRINT_STATE) AS COUNT FROM SPRINT A GROUP BY A.SPRINT_STATE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.PROJECT_TITLE , B.CHANGE_TIME FROM PROJECT A LEFT JOIN PROJECT_RECORD B ON (A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO)
ORDER BY B.CHANGE_TIME DESC, A.PROJECT_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 6
SELECT B.ROLE_NAME NAME , COUNT(ROLE_NAME) as COUNT FROM PROJECT_EMPLOYEE A JOIN ROLE B ON (A.ROLE_NO=B.ROLE_NO) GROUP BY B.ROLE_NAME
